name: Stranded (itch) (Bizzle_Dapp)
description:
Awakening to find themselves stranded in space, our protagonist is led by the Ship AI on a short mission to repair their ship and escape disaster. Source terminal commands and equipment while navigating hazards to restore the ship and continue in stasis into the great unknown.

Stranded is a short story experience made by Bizzle_Dapp and friends over the course of 9 days. We sincerely hope you enjoy the experience and have fun playing something we all had a great deal of joy (and late nights) creating.
